function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through respiratory droplets and contaminated surfaces","Impact":"High number of undetected COVID-19 cases and community spread","Mitigation":"Implementing immediate isolation, rapid diagnosis, and contact tracking technology","Technologies":"Contact tracking technology, rapid diagnosis tools","People":"General public, healthcare workers, communities","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"High cost of contact tracking, testing, and isolation","Impact":"Disruption of economic and social costs, affecting communities and businesses","Mitigation":"Finding cost-effective solutions for testing and isolation, minimizing economic impact","Technologies":"Affordable testing technologies, cost-effective isolation strategies","People":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, businesses","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, businesses"},{"Description":"Potential risk of COVID-19 in untreated drinking water and wastewater","Impact":"Public health risk from contaminated water sources","Mitigation":"Wastewater surveillance and analysis, monitoring of water and wastewater systems","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance tools, water quality monitoring systems","People":"General public, water and sanitation workers","Owner":"Health organizations, government water management agencies"}]}
